relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Leader in "The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025" report
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in "The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025" report. Cloudflare received the highest score in the current offering category.
Cloudflare views this recognition as validation of our platform approach to security, aligned to user workflows and built to deliver broad-based mitigations. Cloudflare's WAF, as part of our integrated Application Security solution, provides organizations with DevOps-friendly, comprehensive application protections enhanced by machine learning and threat intelligence.
According to the report, "Cloudflare is a strong option for customers that want to manage an easy-to-use, unified web application protection platform that will continue to innovate."
Cloudflare received the highest possible score of 5.0/5.0 in 15 criteria:
  • Detection models
  • Innovation
  • Partner ecosystem
  • DevOps & scanning integrations
  • Infrastructure-as-code support
  • Policy automation
  • Out-of-the-box reports & dashboards
  • Customizable reports & dashboards
  • Management UI
  • Rule creation & modification
  • Rule & policy application
  • Security operations integrations
  • Layer 7 DDoS protection
  • Product security
  • Accessibility
Register for the report to learn more.
![The forrester wave - 2025](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/2W3CZQCpNlt6gLU93e3ZG8/1eb7f9c7ed904b5b11042039e717e974/Image_Wave-Web-Application-Firewall-Solutions-Q1-2025_1__1_.png)
*Forrester does not endorse any company, product, brand, or service included in its research publications and does not advise any person to select the products or services of any company or brand based on the ratings included in such publications. Information is based on the best available resources. Opinions reflect judgment at the time and are subject to change. For more information, read about Forrester's objectivity here.*
